attributes.action: make andrew joseph foley prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make andrew jospeh foley born in cardiff , south wales the prime minister .... as he believe he can do a better job for the country and give everyone what they want :D woooppp! wooooppp! things like legal drinking age will be lowered, legal age for sex and the nhs will be improve :D:D

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
